name: Myriad (Haakurei)
description:
In Myriad, you start o as a lone particle in an empty, lonely world trying to find some company. As you progress in the world, you find another particle to bond with, which makes it all seem a little less barren. However, the two of you soon encounter the Entity, a violent creature out for blood. You, the original particle, fall at its hands and continue as the companion you’ve made, now eager to get revenge. Continuing despite this great loss, you find more and more members to join your group, turning the environment around you colorful and harmonic in sound. But be careful… the Entity roams closer than you might think.

Made by:
